text:
Christie Blatchford (May 20, 1951 – February 12, 2020) was a Canadian newspaper columnist, journalist and broadcaster. Notable publications she wrote for include "Toronto Sun", "National Post" and "The Globe and Mail". She also published four non-fiction books. She was born in Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec.
Blatchford died of lung cancer in Toronto, Ontario on February 12, 2020. She was 68.
